General.Name: Firefinch Ltd
General.Description: Firefinch Limited operates as a gold mining company. It holds an 80% interest in the Morila Gold Mine in Mali. The company was formerly known as Mali Lithium Limited and changed its name to Firefinch Limited in November 2020. Firefinch Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is based in West Leederville, Australia.
General.Address: 31 Ventnor Avenue, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
